translation.it: Dopo la morte di mio padre,

translation.en: I wanted nothing more than my mother's happiness.
translation.it: non volevo altro che la felicità di mia madre.

translation.en: For what kind of man would I be if I did not help my mother?
translation.it: Che uomo sarei se non aiutassi mia madre?

translation.en: If I did not save her?
Have you figured it out yet, fatso?
How many years since we took over the ranch
translation.it: Da quanti anni abbiamo preso il ranch

translation.en: from the Old Gent and Old Lady?
You ever try the house bath, Phil?
translation.it: Hai mai provato la vasca, Phil?

translation.en: [Phil] Early up tomorrow, brother. Big old drive.
translation.it: Ci si sveglia presto domani, fratello. Il viaggio è lungo.

translation.en: [Phil] There's a dead cow. Keep our cattle away.
translation.it: C'è una mucca morta. Tieni lontano la mandria.

translation.en: What's "it"? All right, fatso, I'll tell you what "it" is.
translation.it: Non lo sai? Va bene, panzone. Ora te lo dico.

translation.en: Twenty-five years since our first run together.
translation.it: Sono venticinque anni dalla nostra prima uscita.

translation.en: Know what we should do? What's that?
Go camping again in the mountains and shoot ourselves some fresh elk liver.
translation.it: Campeggiare in montagna e spararci un bel fegato d'alce.

translation.en: Cook it right there on the coals like Bronco Henry taught us.
translation.it: Farlo alla brace come ci insegnò Bronco Henry.

translation.en: You act like it pains you to hitch two words together.
translation.it: Pare che ti faccia male spiccicare due parole.

translation.en: Do you what they'd prefer to eat?
They like the fried chicken dinner.
translation.it: A loro piace il pollo fritto.

translation.en: [boy] Yes? I'm going to need your room.
translation.it: - Sì? - Mi serve la tua stanza.

translation.en: -[boy] Do you like the mansion? -[woman] Too much to clean.
translation.it: - Ti piace la villa? - Troppo da pulire.

translation.en: You wouldn't have to clean it. There would be cleaners.
translation.it: Non la puliresti tu. Lo farebbero per te.

translation.en: -I need three chickens. Can you do them? -All right.
translation.it: - Mi servono tre polli. Ci pensi tu? - Va bene.

translation.en: [sighs] You're gonna have to move your stuff to the shed.
translation.it: Dovrai spostare le tue cose nel fienile.

translation.en: I'll make a bed for you on the floor.
translation.it: Ti preparerò un letto per terra.

translation.en: Well, we can't wait forever. The cattle are in the yards, so drink up.
translation.it: Non possiamo aspettare in eterno. Le mandrie sono sistemate. Bevete.

translation.en: I couldn't make the boys hold back forever.
translation.it: Non potevo più trattenere i ragazzi.

translation.en: Checked the power, and it's held up. Not coming till morning.
translation.it: Sono andato a controllare, il treno arriverà domattina.

translation.en: Oh, no, thanks. Phil, they're ready for us next door at the Red Mill.
translation.it: No, grazie. Phil, ci aspettano al Red Mill.

translation.en: Twenty-five years ago, where were you, Georgie Boy?
translation.it: Venticinque anni fa, dov'eri, George bello?

translation.en: A chubby know-nothing too dumb to get through college.
translation.it: Eri un cicciottello ignorante, troppo stupido per finire il college.

translation.en: One person in particular taught you and me ranching
translation.it: Una persona in particolare ci ha insegnato a tenere il ranch.

translation.en: So, to us brothers, Romulus and Remus, and the wolf who raised us.
translation.it: A noi fratelli, Romolo e Remo, e al Lupo che ci ha cresciuti.
Il capo va via. A cena, ragazzi.

translation.en: Rose? Rose, play piano for us please. [Rose] I can't!
translation.it: - Rosie, ci suoni il piano? - Non posso!

translation.en: -Is everything all right? -[George] Yes, ma'am. Fine.
I wonder what little lady made these.
translation.it: Mi chiedo… che signorina li ha fatti?

translation.en: So I made them to look like the ones in our garden.
translation.it: Li ho fatti come quelli del nostro giardino.

translation.en: They're just as real as possible.
All right. Now, gentlemen, look. See, that's what you do with the cloth.
translation.it: Osservate cosa si fa con il tovagliolo.

translation.en: -It's really just for wine drips. -[Phil] Ooh, you got that, boys?
translation.it: - Se il vino gocciolasse. - Capito, ragazzi?

translation.en: -Did Bronco ever eat here? -No, he did not.
translation.it: Bronco ha mai mangiato qui? No, qui mai.

translation.en: Uh, back then we had herring at the saloon and a whole lot of alcohol.
translation.it: All'epoca, si mangiavano aringhe al saloon e si beveva molto alcol.

translation.en: I remember this one time, Bronco made this wager that he could jump any horse
translation.it: Una volta Bronco fece la scommessa che poteva far saltare un cavallo

translation.en: over the tables and chairs of the saloon piled up in the street.
translation.it: sopra i tavoli del saloon accatastati per strada.

translation.en: Well, we chose him a nag all right.
walked the horse up to the tables and chairs, talking to him all the while,
translation.it: avvicinò il cavallo ai tavoli e le sedie parlandogli,

translation.en: stroking his big, ugly head while the horse sniffed.
translation.it: accarezzandogli il muso, mentre il cavallo sbuffava.

translation.en: And then he swung on and rode him back and… [exhales]
But to get a nag to jump… ain't heard of.
translation.it: Convincere un brocco a saltare… Mai sentito.

translation.en: [hesitates] What… I don't know what you're talking about.
Do you mind quietening? We're eating.
Shut that down, or I will!
[George] Go on over. I'll settle up.
translation.it: Vai pure, penso io a saldare.

translation.en: Shall I settle up now, Mrs. Gordon, or…
send the bill, and I'll post a check.
translation.it: mandarmi il conto e le mando un assegno.

translation.en: [cowhand] Come over here. I love you.
What you said about her boy tonight, Phil…
translation.it: Quello che hai detto stasera di suo figlio, Phil,

translation.en: She had her ear to the door?
I said her boy needed to snap out of it and get human.
translation.it: Ho detto che suo figlio doveva darsi una svegliata.
L'ho fatto solo notare, tutto qua.

translation.en: Is that how Bronco Henry learned it?
I never saw him out on a lunge, that's a fact.
translation.it: Non lo faceva con una corda questo è certo.

translation.en: [cowhand 4] What is it you see up there, Phil?
Has anyone else seen what you've seen, Phil?
translation.it: Qualcuno ha visto ciò che hai visto, Phil?

translation.en: Come on, Phil. What is it?
Not if you can't see it, there ain't.
translation.it: Se non riesci a vederlo, non c'è.

translation.en: [hesitates] I really just came to see you.
translation.it: In realtà sono venuto a vederla.
per la carne, il pesce e il formaggio."

translation.en: I wish they wouldn't do that. I don't like drinking.
translation.it: Vorrei non lo facessero. Non mi piace bere.

translation.en: I'd say they have more in them than wine. Sounds like booze.
translation.it: Direi che bevono anche qualcosa di più forte del vino.

translation.en: They're early. I should have never put the pianola in there.
translation.it: Iniziano presto. Non dovevo mettere lì la pianola.

translation.en: I see… I see the Herndon doctor and the undertaker, Mr. Weltz.
translation.it: Vedo il dottore di Herndon e il becchino, signor Weltz.

translation.en: Oh, goodness. [sighs] I wish Peter were here. [chuckles]
translation.it: Oh, Signore. Vorrei che Peter fosse qui…

translation.en: He should be serving the salad, and I need to fry the chicken.
translation.it: Servirebbe l'insalata mentre io friggo il pollo…

translation.en: Sometimes if you get food on the table…
translation.it: Ci vuole tempo per preparare tutto.

translation.en: I'm gonna run and get Peter.
-Uh, looks like I'm the new waiter. -[piano stops playing]
Run into any snow down below?
Well, I guess I'll roll me a smoke since I'm woke up.
translation.it: Allora mi giro una sigaretta dato che sono sveglio.

translation.en: Beech. That's where I aimed for.
translation.it: A Beech. È lì che volevo andare.

translation.en: Whatcha doin' down there, Georgie Boy?
translation.it: Che ci facevi lì, Georgie bello?

translation.en: I was speaking to Mrs. Gordon.
Give her half a chance, and she'll be after some dollar for Miss Nancy's college fee.
translation.it: Ti spillerà qualche dollaro per gli studi della signorina.

translation.en: Remember how the Old Lady brought those girls out to the ranch
translation.it: Ricordi che la nostra Vecchia portò ragazze al ranch

translation.en: as soon as we could get hard-ons?

translation.it: Ti ricordi la regina della zuppa al pomodoro?

translation.en: Wasn't it her that wrote you,
"I always will remember the western moon"?
Well, guess you coulda taken her out without first putting a sack over her head.
translation.it: Almeno quella non aveva bisogno di un sacco sulla testa,

translation.en: [Phil] It's a piece of ass you're after, fatso,
I'm damn sure you can get it without a license.
translation.it: puoi fartela anche senza mettere un anello al dito.

translation.en: [cowhand] What do you do with these?
Do you cut 'em up or something?
translation.it: Le tagli o qualcosa del genere?
E con suo… figlio… mezzo rimbambito."

translation.en: A little desk for your big desk.
translation.it: Piccola scrivania per la grande scrivania.

translation.en: -[sighs] -Did you write to the Old Lady?
Yeah, I dropped 'em both a line.
translation.it: Ho scritto a tutti e due.

translation.en: Did you say something about Rose?
Well, you know as well as I do what the Old Lady would feel
translation.it: sai benissimo cosa direbbe la Vecchia

translation.en: if she thought you were getting mixed up with her.
translation.it: sai benissimo cosa direbbe la Vecchia se sapesse che frequenti una come lei.

translation.en: The Old Lady would feel as one Mrs. Burbank would feel
translation.it: La Vecchia si sentirebbe come una signora Burbank

translation.en: She got rid of her property in Beech.
translation.it: Ha venduto la sua proprietà a Beech.

translation.en: Stand steady, you little bitch, huh?
Look at me, you little bitch! Huh? [grunts] Yeah?
[woman] My school boarders eat dinner at 6:00 p.m. sharp.
translation.it: Gli studenti della mia pensione cenano alle 18.

translation.en: No dish-washing duty if he has homework.
translation.it: Non deve lavare i piatti se ha compiti.

translation.en: [Rose] Maybe you'd like to come to the ranch sometimes?
translation.it: Ti piacerebbe venire al ranch qualche volta?

translation.en: [Peter] May I keep some of these rose petals?
translation.it: Posso tenere qualche petalo di rosa?

translation.en: [George] I've been thinking we should have some sort of dinner party
translation.it: Pensavo che dovremmo organizzare una cena per presentarti ai miei.

translation.en: to introduce you to my parents.
translation.it: una cena per presentarti ai miei.

translation.en: And perhaps we could invite the governor and his wife too.
translation.it: Magari potremmo anche invitare il governatore e sua moglie.

translation.en: I saw them in Herndon today, and, uh,
translation.it: Li ho visti a Herndon oggi

translation.en: I… I kind of already mentioned it to them.
Uh, maybe you'd be kind enough to play something on our old piano.
translation.it: Magari potrai suonarci qualcosa al piano.

translation.en: But, George, I'm not very good.
-I only played for the moving pictures. -[chuckles]
translation.it: Ho suonato soltanto per il cinematografo.

translation.en: You are plenty fine enough for us.
The Old Lady can't play a note, so… [chuckles]
translation.it: La Vecchia non suona una nota, dunque…

translation.en: This looks like a good spot.
translation.it: Qui mi sembra un buon posto,

translation.en: One, two, three. And to the side.
translation.it: Uno, due, tre. E di lato.

translation.en: -To the side again. One, two… -Sorry, I… I really can't.
translation.it: - Di nuovo di lato. - Scusami, non riesco.
Non so proprio ballare. Stai ballando.

translation.en: One, two, three. To the side.
I told you I'd teach you. [chuckles]
I wanted to say how nice it is
[George] Go on up and get out of the cold.
translation.it: Vai di sopra e mettiti al caldo.
La caldaia non funziona? Non chiederlo a me.

translation.en: -I'll go down and shake it up. -I've been hanging around for you all day.
translation.it: Vado a dargli un'occhiata. Ti ho aspettato tutto il giorno. C'è un atto da firmare per il Vecchio.

translation.en: There's a deed the Old Gent wants sent to him.
translation.it: Ti ho aspettato tutto il giorno. C'è un atto da firmare per il Vecchio.

translation.en: Well, I figure that can go till morning.
we had such a nice trip--
This is the bathroom. Just make yourself at home.
translation.it: Questo è il bagno. Fai come a casa tua.

translation.en: Now, you just make yourself comfortable.
Now, I'm going to bring you a surprise.
Well, then it won't be a surprise.
translation.it: Se te lo dico, non è più una sorpresa.

translation.en: [housekeeper] When the rains come, the cellar gets flooded.
translation.it: Quando piove, la cantina si allaga.

translation.en: So, the rats all drown. They float to the surface.
translation.it: Quando piove, la cantina si allaga. I topi affogano e poi galleggiano in superficie.

translation.en: I have to get the young lads in to scoop 'em all up with a…
translation.it: Devo chiamare i ragazzi per raccoglierli con...

translation.en: -[George] Turn it around that way. -[young housekeeper] Please, I'll take it.
-What is it? -[George] Head to the front door.
-[George] You got it? -[cowhand 2] Yeah, I got it.
-[cowhand 3 grunting] Whoa, hold it. -It's a Mason & Hamlin baby grand.
translation.it: È un pianoforte Mason e Hamlin.

translation.en: Oh no, it's… it's too good for me. I'm…
translation.it: Ma è troppo bello per me.

translation.en: I'm just very average. I… I only know tunes.
translation.it: Sono mediocre, so soltanto dei motivetti.

translation.en: We don't want a concert. We just wanna hear you play, Rose.
translation.it: Non vogliamo un concerto, vogliamo solo sentirti suonare.

translation.en: -I should like to look on the governor… -[George] Easy.
[housekeeper] …as he drives up and gets out of his vehicle.
translation.it: appena arriva ed esce dalla macchina.

translation.en: -[cowhand] You make a rope with these? -[Phil] These strips? Yeah.
translation.it: Fai le corde con queste? Con queste strisce? Sì.

translation.en: You boys find something needs doing.
I just came over to speak about something.
translation.it: Sono venuto a parlarti di una cosa.

translation.en: Come on, partner. Open your talker. What is it?
translation.it: Forza, socio, apri la bocca. Cosa c'è?

translation.en: His Nibs will be here for dinner and the Old Gent and the Old Lady.
translation.it: Sua Altezza verrà a cena, e il Vecchio e la Vecchia.

translation.en: Well, sir, ain't we going into society.
No, I… I like to hear Rose play.
translation.it: No, mi piace sentire Rose suonare.

translation.en: Well, old-timer, what is it? What's in the noodle?
translation.it: Allora, vecchio mio, cosa c'è? Cosa bolle in pentola?

translation.en: -Well, it's about His Nibs, the governor. -[Phil] All right.
translation.it: Riguarda Sua Altezza, il governatore. Va bene.

translation.en: Well, it's not so much about His Nibs
but His Nibs' wife, actually, uh…
translation.it: ma la moglie di Sua Altezza.

translation.en: I was thinking His Nibs probably wouldn't mind so much,
translation.it: Non credo importi un granché a Sua Altezza,

translation.en: Well, it's sort of a hard thing… [exhales sharply]
She might mind if you come to the table without a washup.
translation.it: Le darebbe fastidio se tu venissi a tavola senza lavarti.

translation.en: We may as well try and warm this place.
You keep warm. I can bring them in.
translation.it: Stai al caldo, ci penso io.

translation.en: [woman chuckling] Oh, how sweet. They have their own umbrella.
translation.it: Che graziosi con il loro ombrellino.

translation.en: -[George] Orange blossoms. -It's an island of civilization here.
translation.it: Fiori d'arancio. Siamo in un'oasi di civiltà qui.

translation.en: I was, uh, telling Georgie about your brother.
translation.it: Parlavo con Georgie di suo fratello.

translation.en: Phi Beta Kappa at Yale, wasn't it?
translation.it: Laureato a Yale, non è vero?

translation.en: So, uh… he swears at the cattle in Greek or Latin?
translation.it: Impreca al bestiame in greco o in latino?

translation.en: Uh, Rose plays the piano very well.
translation.it: Rose suona il piano molto bene.

translation.en: I'll just go have a look-see out the back for Phil.
translation.it: Vado a dare un'occhiata fuori a cercare Phil.

translation.en: Oh, good. I want to meet this brother.
Ah! Here are two people we can't fool.
Oh no, you cannot. We know everything. We're walking encyclopedias.
translation.it: Non potete. Sappiamo tutto, siamo enciclopedie viventi.

translation.en: At least I am. I have nothing to do but read.
translation.it: Almeno io, non faccio altro che leggere.

translation.en: [Old Gent] She's been reading "The Curse of Tutankhamun" in The Digest.
translation.it: Sta leggendo nel Digest "La maledizione di Tutankhamon".

translation.en: So, uh, you believe in the curse?
translation.it: Sta leggendo nel Digest "La maledizione di Tutankhamon". Crede nella maledizione?

translation.en: Oh, no, no, I'm not drinking George's concoction.
translation.it: Non bevo gli intrugli di George.

translation.en: Yes, I do. But did you know that Tutankhamun was just a boy?
translation.it: Sì, ci credo. Sapevate che Tutankhamon era solo un giovane di 18 anni?
Sapevate che Tutankhamon era solo un giovane di 18 anni?

translation.en: Everyone's here. And we're just about to eat.
translation.it: Sono tutti qui. Stiamo per mangiare.

translation.en: Yes, we're counting on your conversation.
I shouldn't have said what I said to you about--
translation.it: Non dovevo dire ciò che ho detto di te…

translation.en: You two can keep your apologies to yourself. I'm not coming.
translation.it: Tenetevi le scuse per voi due, non vengo.

translation.en: The Old Lady wants to see you too. She's come a long way.
translation.it: Anche la Vecchia vuole vederti, è venuta da lontano.

translation.en: You can tell them the truth.
That I stink and I like it.
[Old Lady] Nothing could have happened to Phil, could it?
translation.it: Sarà mica successo qualcosa a Phil?

translation.en: [George] No, he'll be fine. Something just must've come up.
translation.it: No, tutto a posto. Avrà avuto un imprevisto.

translation.en: are you going to play for us?
[Old Lady] Yes, George told me you play very well.
translation.it: George mi ha detto che suoni bene.

translation.en: -Oh no, I'm terribly out of practice. -[Edward] Yes, we'd love that.
Come now, you've been playing a lot.
I don't know what to play.
-What one? -Why, the… the one about the Gypsy.
I… I can't seem to remember that one.
I… I played in a cinema pit for hours and hours.
translation.it: Ho suonato ore e ore nella fossa di un cinema.
Ho suonato ore e ore nella fossa di un cinema. Scusatemi tanto.

translation.en: Well, she got you halter trained, right, George? That's the main thing.
translation.it: Però ha rimesso in sella George, no? È la cosa più importante.

translation.en: No, it was a lovely, lovely evening. Thank you.
translation.it: Ma no, è stata una serata piacevole. Grazie.

translation.en: So, you weren't eaten by a cougar.
translation.it: Non è stato divorato un puma.

translation.en: I am sorry to have missed your conversation.
translation.it: Mi spiace non aver conversato con lei,

translation.en: You're gonna want to keep your distance. I'm just off the horse.
translation.it: Meglio non avvicinarsi, sono appena sceso da cavallo.

translation.en: Anyhows, you don't want conversation. You've been listening to the pinano and dancing, I guess.
translation.it: A che serve la conversazione. Avrete ascoltato il piano e ballato.

translation.en: You sure did practice a terrible lot.
See, you wouldn't think there was much difference between a cinema pit and a dinner party.
translation.it: Non credevo ci fosse differenza fra la fossa di un cinema e una cena.

translation.en: [Old Lady] Where have you been, Phil?
I could hardly eat worrying about you.
translation.it: Non riuscivo a mangiare, ero preoccupata.

translation.en: I didn't get washed up, so I didn't come.
translation.it: Non sono venuto perché non mi sono lavato.

translation.en: Oh, he's a ranchman, isn't that right? That's honest dirt.
translation.it: È un uomo da ranch, non è vero? È sporcizia sana.

translation.en: [Rose] I wondered if you didn't think about leaving your medical books here for the summer.
translation.it: Hai pensato di lasciare qui i tuoi libri di medicina per l'estate?

translation.en: I thought about it, but… but you understand they were Dad's.
translation.it: Ci ho pensato, ma erano di papà, capisci.

translation.en: He calls me Doctor, and I call him Professor,
translation.it: Mi chiama dottore e io lo chiamo professore,

translation.en: Why don't you invite your friend to the ranch?
translation.it: Perché non inviti il tuo amico al ranch?

translation.en: I don't want him to meet a certain person.
translation.it: Non voglio che conosca una certa persona.

translation.en: [cowhand 5] How come you don't wear gloves?
Castrate 1,500 head, then nick your thumb on the last.
translation.it: Castrare 1500 capi, poi tagliarti proprio sull'ultimo.

translation.en: Well, fatso, I think we're finished.
You're gonna see him creeping all over the place now.
translation.it: Lo vedrete gironzolare dappertutto d'ora in poi.
Attenzione ai fuochi, sta arrivando l'estate.

translation.en: Which also means any Indians camping need to be moved off the property.
translation.it: Bisogna spostare gli indiani che campeggiano nella proprietà,

translation.en: -We got animals they want to eat. Got it? -[dog barking]
translation.it: Si vogliono mangiare i nostri animali. - Capito? - Sissignore.

translation.en: Keep your eyes and ears open.
Maybe find yourselves an arrowhead up by them aspens.
translation.it: Trovatevi una punta di freccia tra i pioppi.

translation.en: It's George's week in town, so it's just Phil.
translation.it: È la settimana di George in città, c'è soltanto Phil.

translation.en: Oh no. It's… it's not a snake, is it?
[Peter] Come here. Come here. Come here.
You can eat in your room.
[housekeeper] They dug up that graveyard to make way for the new highway.
translation.it: Hanno scavato il cimitero, per costruire una nuova strada.

translation.en: Among those buried there was a friend of mine.
translation.it: Fra i sepolti c'era una mia amica,

translation.en: A clumsy tractor driver broke open the coffin,
translation.it: ma un conduttore di trattori maldestro ha spaccato la bara

translation.en: and they found her hair had continued to grow after her death.
translation.it: e hanno scoperto che i suoi capelli hanno continuato crescere dopo la sua morte.

translation.en: The whole coffin just stuffed with her lovely golden hair.
translation.it: Tutta la bara era riempita dai suoi bei capelli biondi.

translation.en: Except for a few feet from the end,
-[housekeeper] Some say she was a beauty. -What?
[housekeeper] Golden braids on top of her hair.
translation.it: Con le trecce dorate in testa.

translation.en: Oh! Yes, go and see. It's very sweet.
translation.it: Sì. Vai a vederlo, è carino.

translation.en: -No, please. Get out of my room. -Where's your rabbit?
translation.it: - No, per favore. Esci. - Dov'è il tuo coniglio?

translation.en: Now, even if you're happy being in your room all day,
translation.it: So che preferisci stare chiuso in camera,

translation.en: -Mom, I have a lot to do. -Come on.
But if I want to be a surgeon, I have to practice.
translation.it: Per diventare chirurgo devo fare pratica.

translation.en: Well, you're not to kill them in the house, Peter.
translation.it: Ma non li devi uccidere in casa.

translation.en: No, I'm putting my foot down.
Oh, where'd a man be if he always did what his mother told him?
translation.it: Chi diventerebbe un uomo obbendendo sempre alla madre?

translation.en: I know, Lola. You don't have to…
You don't have to narrate it. I'll just… remember.
translation.it: Non devi dirlo. Me lo ricordo.

translation.en: Lola, can you please take over? I have a migraine.
translation.it: Lola, ci pensi tu? Ho un'emicrania.

translation.en: -I hit that way. -I was aiming for you.
[Rose sniffles] I feel like my eyes are going to pop out of my head.
translation.it: Sento gli occhi che mi escono dalla testa.
- È freddo. - È soltanto un uomo, Peter.

translation.en: He's just a man, Peter, only another man.
translation.it: - È freddo. - È soltanto un uomo, Peter. Solo un altro uomo.

translation.en: Get out of here, you little bitch!
[cowhand] ♪ Oh, Lord, oh, Lord ♪ ♪ Put whiskey in my bottle ♪
translation.it: Oh Signore, oh Signore Mettimi il whisky nella bottiglia

translation.en: ♪ Let the snow melt off Wash away my sorrow ♪
translation.it: Fai sciogliere la neve E spazza via la mia tristezza
Quella luna di miele sopra di me

translation.en: No one tell him to soak those jeans?
translation.it: Non ha messo a mollo i jeans?

translation.en: [Phil] Well, I don't see any Mr. Burbank here.
I guess it's hard for a young'un like you to call an old fella like me
translation.it: Dev'essere dura per un giovane come te chiamare per nome un vecchio come me
Dev'essere dura per un giovane come te chiamare per nome un vecchio come me all'inizio.

translation.en: Now come and take a look at this.
Have you done any braiding or plaiting yourself, Pete?
translation.it: Hai mai intrecciato una corda così, Pete?

translation.en: Peter, we kind of got off on the wrong foot.
translation.it: Peter, abbiamo cominciato col piede sbagliato.
Ah sì, signore? Basta con questo "signore".

translation.en: People who get to be good friends.
Now, you see? You did it.
I'm gonna finish this rope and give it to you and teach you how to use it.
translation.it: Finirò questa corda per te e t'insegnerò a usarla.

translation.en: Sort of a lonesome place out here, Pete.
translation.it: È un posto solitario qui, Pete.

translation.en: Unless you get in the swing of things.
How long do you expect it would take to finish that rope?
translation.it: Quanto ti ci vorrà per finire la corda?

translation.en: I could get it finished before you go back to school.
translation.it: Potrei finirla prima che te ne torni a scuola.

translation.en: It won't be very long then, Phil.
You can sit on it, Pete.
Don't let your mom make a sissy of you.
translation.it: Tua madre vuole farti diventare un fifone.

translation.en: Well, just by sitting there, you're soaking up all the riding know-how you'll ever need and then some.
translation.it: Seduto lì impari a cavalcare e anche molto di più.

translation.en: That saddle belonged to Bronco Henry.
translation.it: Era la sella di Bronco Henry.
Il più grande cavallerizzo mai conosciuto.

translation.en: There's a cliff way out back of the ranch with initials and 1805 carved into it.
translation.it: C'è un dirupo all'estremità del ranch, con incise delle iniziali e la data 1805.

translation.en: Must have been some fella from the Lewis and Clark Expedition.
translation.it: Forse qualcuno della spedizione di Lewis e Clarke.

translation.en: They were real men in those days.
Let's say just you and me go out for a couple of days.
translation.it: Perché non ci andiamo io e te

translation.en: Find those trails and follow them to the end.
translation.it: a tracciare quei sentieri e seguirli fino in fondo?

translation.en: Wouldn't be surprised if there were gold
translation.it: Non mi sorprenderebbe che ci fosse… dell'oro

translation.en: or precious minerals in them there rocks.
translation.it: o dei metalli preziosi in quelle rocce.

translation.en: [Peter] Do many of the calves die from wolves?
translation.it: Muoiono molti vitelli a causa dei lupi?

translation.en: There's always a few that get… tore up or hamstrung or die of anthrax.
translation.it: Ci sono sempre certi che sono… sbranati oppure feriti o muoiono di carbonchio.

translation.en: You know, you talk like a Victrola record. You know that?
translation.it: Parli come un grammofono, lo sai, vero?

translation.en: -Did Bronco Henry teach you to ride, Phil? -[Phil] Yep.
translation.it: Bronco Henry ti ha insegnato a cavalcare, Phil?

translation.en: He taught me to use my eyes in ways that other people can't.
translation.it: Mi ha insegnato a usare gli occhi come altri non sanno fare.

translation.en: Most people look at it and just see a hill.
translation.it: La gente guarda e vede solo una collina.

translation.en: Where Bronco looked at it, what do you suppose he saw?
translation.it: Quando Bronco la guardava, cosa pensi vedesse?

translation.en: -The hell, you just saw that now? -No.
translation.it: Che diavolo, l'hai appena visto? No.

translation.en: See, it looks like a dog with its jaw wide open.
translation.it: Vedi, sembra un cane… con la mascella aperta.

translation.en: Can't you come in and talk for a little?
You've gotten to be quite friendly with Phil, haven't you?
translation.it: Hai fatto molta… amicizia con Phil, non è vero?

translation.en: He's making a rope for me.
Peter, I wish you wouldn't make that sound with your comb.
translation.it: Smettila di fare quel suono con il pettine.
Quand'ero piccola, mi veniva un brivido alla spina dorsale

translation.en: I felt a chill in my spine when I heard the chalk squeak on a blackboard.
translation.it: Quand'ero piccola, mi veniva un brivido alla spina dorsale quando sentivo il gessetto sulla lavagna.

translation.en: Oh, Miss… [chuckling] Mrs. Merchant, that's who it was.
translation.it: La signora Merchant, ecco chi era.

translation.en: She… she drew chalk stars by our names on the blackboard.
translation.it: Disegnava stelle con il gesso accanto ai nostri nomi.

translation.en: I wonder why it was stars she gave us.
translation.it: Chissà perché ci dava delle stelle.

translation.en: Why not diamonds? Why not hearts?
I wonder why it was always stars.
translation.it: Mi chiedo perché erano… sempre stelle.

translation.en: Because stars are supposed to be unreachable.
But they weren't unreachable because she gave them to us.
translation.it: Ma non lo erano, perché ce le dava.

translation.en: We had this valentine box, and it was covered with white crepe paper.
translation.it: A San Valentino si usava una scatola ricoperta di carta di crêpe bianca.

translation.en: And we would paste big, red hearts on it.
translation.it: E ci incollavamo grandi cuori rossi sopra.

translation.en: And you had a great many valentines.
Is there a sound that makes you shiver?
translation.it: C'è un suono che ti dà i brividi?

translation.en: Mother, you don't have to do this.
I'll see you don't have to do it.
translation.it: Ci penso io a non fartelo fare.

translation.en: -[Phil] This his first week? -[cowhand 1] Nope, third.
translation.it: È la prima settimana? - No, la terza. - La terza?

translation.en: Open up the gate. Let him out.
-You sure? He's not ready. -Go on. Let him out.
translation.it: - Sicuro? Non è pronto. - Forza. Fallo uscire.

translation.en: -[Phil] What you doing? -Going to give him a hand.
translation.it: - Cosa fai? - Gli do una mano.

translation.en: -Let him figure it out. -[cowhand 4] Oh, oh!
Fall off, you get back on.
Can't Peter go with you today?
Well, he could, but him and Phil have kinda paired up.
translation.it: Potrebbe, ma lui e Phil si sono trovati.
Non mi sta bene. Non voglio che stia con Phil.

translation.en: -I don't want him to be with Phil at all. -But, Rose…
translation.it: Non mi sta bene. Non voglio che stia con Phil. Ma, Rose,

translation.en: [splutters] He's helping him. He taught him how to ride.
translation.it: lo sta aiutando. Gli ha insegnato a cavalcare.

translation.en: You know who started riding as late as you?
translation.it: Sai chi ha iniziato a cavalcare tardi come te?

translation.en: Hadn't done any of it till he was about your age now.
translation.it: Non sapeva cavalcare fino alla tua età.

translation.en: Hey, Peter, let's see how long it takes
translation.it: Peter, vediamo quanto ci mette Codino di cotone a scappare.

translation.en: before Mr. Cottontail makes a run for the open.
translation.it: vediamo quanto ci mette Codino di cotone a scappare.

translation.en: Now, as kids, we used to take bets… [grunts]
before the animals ran out and made a run for it.
translation.it: prima che uscissero gli animali… per scappare.

translation.en: I guess he has to be gutsy.
Well, put him out of his misery.
You got a tan. That's a cowboy tan you got.
translation.it: Sei abbronzato. Hai un'abbronzatura da cowboy.

translation.en: a man was made by patience and the odds against him.
translation.it: un uomo si vede nella sua pazienza di fronte alle avversità.

translation.en: And you had to try and remove them.
Well, you've certainly got obstacles. That's a fact, Pete, me boy.
translation.it: E tu, caro Pete, hai certamente degli ostacoli.

translation.en: I guess you know she's been half-shot all summer.

translation.it: Mai. Ma il tuo vecchio, Pete?

translation.en: I guess he hit the bottle pretty hard?
Until right at the very end.
He used to worry I wasn't kind enough.
translation.it: Temeva che non fossi abbastanza gentile,

translation.en: Things will work out for you yet.
translation.it: Le cose si metteranno a posto.

translation.en: They were standing right in front of the damn things asking,
translation.it: Stavo proprio davanti a loro e mi chiedevano:

translation.en: "Do we have any hides?" Are they leaving?
Yes, they've got their horse going.
[Mrs. Lewis panting] I told them the hides are gonna be burned.
translation.it: Gli ho detto che bruciamo le pelli.

translation.en: Why are the hides going to be burned?
Phil doesn't want anyone else to have 'em.
translation.it: Phil non vuole darle a nessuno.

translation.en: Waits till there's a big pile and sets fire to the lot.
translation.it: Aspetta che si ammassino, poi le brucia.

translation.en: [chuckles] He'd blow up if they even touched 'em.
translation.it: Farebbe una scenata, se le toccassero.

translation.en: It would be my honor if you would take them.
translation.it: Sarebbe un onore se te le prendessi.
Mio marito è il padrone del ranch.

translation.en: -[cowhand 1] You all right, ma'am? -[cowhand 2] Is she breathing?

translation.it: Tutto il maledetto pellame è sparito!

translation.en: Oh, she really put her foot into it this time.
-Or maybe even gave them away. -[Peter] Why? Why?
Why would she do that, Phil? She knew that we needed the hides.
translation.it: Perché l'avrebbe fatto? Sa che ci servono.
Con gli occhi di fuori! Era sbronza fradicia!

translation.en: I'd think you'd know from the books your pa left you
translation.it: Saprai dai libri di tuo padre che tua madre è un caso di…

translation.en: that your ma's got a… a whatchamacallit.
translation.it: Saprai dai libri di tuo padre che tua madre è un caso di… Come si chiama?

translation.en: Alcoholic personality. It comes under the letter A!
translation.it: Alcolismo. Si trova alla lettera A!

translation.en: -You're not gonna say anything to her? -[Phil] Say anything?
translation.it: Non le dirai niente? Dire niente?

translation.en: But sure as one good hell, brother George is going to.
translation.it: Lo farà fratello George, quant'è vero Iddio.

translation.en: It is high time that that bozo and you got next to a few…
translation.it: È il momento che tu e il deficiente vi rendiate conto…

translation.en: What do you ever call them? Facts!
translation.it: Come cavolo si dice? Dei fatti!

translation.en: She stashes alcohol all around the place, even drinking in the stinking alley.
translation.it: Nasconde l'alcol da tutte le parti. Beve anche nel vicolo puzzolente.

translation.en: Look at your face in the mirror!
Is it that she could like? Or our money? Wake the hell up!
translation.it: Sei tu che le piaci? O i nostri soldi? Svegliati!

translation.en: The hides were only going to be burned.
I've got rawhide to finish the rope.
translation.it: Ho della pelle conciata per finire la corda.

translation.en: What are you doing with rawhide?
translation.it: Che ci fai con la pelle conciata?

translation.en: I wanted to be like you.
That's damn kind of you, Pete.
Everything's gonna be plain sailing for you from now on in.
translation.it: Da ora in poi andrà tutto liscio per te.

translation.en: How old were you when you met Bronco Henry?
translation.it: Quanti anni avevi quando hai conosciuto Bronco Henry?

translation.en: About the age you are now.
translation.it: Più o meno la tua età.

translation.en: We were way off up in the hills shooting elk, and the weather turned mean.
translation.it: Stavamo sulle colline, cacciando alci, quand'è cambiato il tempo.

translation.en: Bronco kept me alive by… lying body against body in a bedroll.
translation.it: Bronco mi ha tenuto vivo stendendoci corpo a corpo in un sacco a pelo.

translation.en: Fell off to sleep that way.
-[cowhand 1] Phil left already? -[cowhand 2] No, he's not here.
translation.it: - Phil è uscito? - No, non c'è.

translation.en: He say he was settin' out early? [cowhand 2] No.
He's not been down at all.
I'll run you into Herndon to see the doctor.
translation.it: Ti porto a Herndon a vedere il dottore.

translation.en: Rose would like you to join us for Christmas, if you care to.
translation.it: Rose vorrebbe invitarvi a Natale, se vi fa piacere.

translation.en: I'll know in a day or two when the results come back.
translation.it: Lo saprò fra qualche giorno quando avrò i risultati.

translation.en: But he never handled diseased animals.
translation.it: Non toccava mai gli animali infetti,

translation.en: my darling from the power of the dog."
translation.it: il mio amore dal potere del cane."
